alert.note: Alert for Dimmit; Frio; Kinney; Maverick; Medina; Uvalde; Zavala (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 28 at 1:05AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Medina, southeastern Kinney, eastern Maverick, Dimmit, southern Uvalde, Zavala and Frio Counties through 200 AM CDT... At 105 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Uvalde Estates to 8 miles southeast of La Pryor to near Chupadera Ranch Airport. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Uvalde, Pearsall, Crystal City, Carrizo Springs, Devine, Dilley, Big Wells, La Pryor, Batesville, El Indio, Lytle, Natalia, Asherton, North Pearsall, Moore, Goldfinch, Chula Vista-River Spur, Hilltop, Las Colonias and Uvalde Estates. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Dimmit; Frio; Kinney; Maverick; Medina; Uvalde; Zavala
